course.subject: MATH
course.name: Reading Course: Geometric Stochastic Analysis
course.description:
This is a reading course on Geometric Stochastic Analysis based on the book 
“Stochastic Analysis on Manifolds” by Elton. P. Hsu. The main focus will be 
Stochastic Differential Equations and Diffusions, Basic Stochastic Differential Geometry, Brownian Motion on Manifolds, Heat Semigroup. Students should seek the course instructor's approval to take this course.
